Commentary.ab: Y19.12b-c para.cinasti vs. cinasti] on the meaning (with bibliography), vid. Kellens, 2010 pp. 37-38.
Y19.12c aϑa] Kellens, 2010 suggests corrupted for iϑa.
Y19.12c yaϑa mazdā̊ hujītīš] sec. Kellens in Y19.12; Geldner in Y19.13. PT together with Y19.13a.

Parallels.ab: yaϑa (Y19.12a) quotes YAV.a yaϑā ahū vairiiō aϑā ratuš aṣ̌āt̰cīt̰ hacā.
vīspanąm mazištəm quotes (Kellens, 2010 p. 42) Y45.6 at̰ frauuaxšiiā vīspanąm mazištəm.
aϑa aɱāi dāmąn ~ Y19.14 yat̰ aɱāi dāmąn.
mazdā̊ hujītīš quotes (Kellens, 2010 p. 42) Y33.10 vīspā̊.stōi hujītaiiō ... mazdā.
